com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseMoveHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseUpHandler, com.google.gwt.event.logical.shared.HasCloseHandlers<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel>, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventPreview, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasAnimation, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasWidgets, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesPopupEvents, java.lang.Iterable<com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget>
public class MovablePopupPanel
				
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel
				
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseMoveHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseUpHandler

Defines a movable "pop up" panel.

A movable "pop up" panel can be moved on the screen by the user by dragging its border. Other than the gwt- DialogBox it does not have a title bar. Also the "movability" of the MovablePopupPanel can be turned on or off (default is on).
